distributeFundsPull().details: backup recovery if any recipient tries to brick the OWRecipient for remaining recipients

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.nonOWRToken: Token to recover (cannot be OWR token)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.account: Address to withdraw on behalf of

distributeFundsPull().notice: Distributes target token inside the contract to recipients

recoverFunds(address,address).notice: Recover non-OWR tokens to a recipient

documentation.text: @dev threshold for pushing balance update as reward or principal

Withdraw token balance for account `account`
 @param account Address to withdraw on behalf of

Distributes target token inside the contract to next-in-line recipients
 @dev can PUSH or PULL funds to recipients
